song.title: Banana Boat 3
song.info:
Download link:
http://sjd.myftp.org/root/pub/mods/Jogeir%20-%20Banana%20Boat%203.mp3
Lyrics:
Jogeir: Aaall people... Here is a de new sensationaaa... da Banana... Crazy Booyyy!
Vidar: Ya man, are you ready people for da new Banana Boata? Women and brothers, this is Banana Boata Number Three.
Jogeir: You want some Ganga man?
Vidar: We are TWO Jamaica man, party, singing for our fans, working on banana boat, to make money for a goat
Jogeir: My brother and I loves to drink rum with lime Ya, no crime, big Party time!
Jogeir: we like da island, Vidar: we like da people, Jogeir: we like bananas Vidar: and we like our jobs, Jogeir: we like da beaches, Vidar: we like da lovers, Jogeir: we like da Ganga Jogeir&Vidar: on da banana boat!
Jogeir: all the yeeh's, Vidar: all the aah's
Jogeir: If you think we are some fools, people here say we rule, because we rule, smoking bananas with daddy cool
Jogeir: My brother and I loves to drink rum with lime Never mind, it's Party time!
Jogeir: we like da island, Vidar: we like da people, Jogeir: we like bananas
Jogeir: we like da beaches Vidar: we like da lovers, Jogeir: we like da Ganga Jogeir&Vidar: on da banana boat! (Repeat)
Assembled for jotting down by Jogeir & Rapture
